mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shiwuzhaoling_id as shiwuzhaolingId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.shiwurenling_yesno_types as shiwurenlingYesnoTypes ,a.shiwurenling_text as shiwurenlingText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_uuid_number as shiwuzhaolingUuidNumber ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_name as shiwuzhaolingName ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_types as shiwuzhaolingTypes ,shiwuzhaoling.status_types as statusTypes ,shiwuzhaoling.yonghu_id as shiwuzhaolingYonghuId ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_photo as shiwuzhaolingPhoto ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_time as shiwuzhaolingTime ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_dizhi as shiwuzhaolingDizhi ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_content as shiwuzhaolingContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM shiwurenling a left JOIN shiwuzhaoling shiwuzhaoling ON a.shiwuzhaoling_id = shiwuzhaoling.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.shiwuzhaoling_id = #{params.shiwuzhaolingId}
and (a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} or shiwuzhaoling.yonghu_id =#{params.yonghuId})
and a.shiwurenling_yesno_types = #{params.shiwurenlingYesnoTypes}
and a.shiwurenling_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwurenlingText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.shiwuzhaoling_id IS NOT NULL
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingUuidNumber},'%')
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingName},'%')
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_types = #{params.shiwuzhaolingTypes}
and shiwuzhaoling.status_types = #{params.statusTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shiwuzhaolingTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shiwuzhaolingTimeEnd})
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_dizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingDizhi},'%')
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
